title: "malg" using excessive amounts of memory
body:
Today during the office hours at Google IO Russ showed me how to switch on memory 
profiling for Go apps. I turned it on for one of my apps, and left it running for 
a few hours. The svg profile is attached. 

The only weird thing seems to be the big chunk dedicated to 'malg', which is 
apparently related to allocating goroutines when the program starts. My app has 
around ~90 goroutines running concurrently. Other than that, things seem pretty 
reasonable. 

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
linux/amd64

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
release.2010-05-04/release

Please provide any additional information below.
